title: Sai Baba of Shirdi
summary: Sai Baba of Shirdi (died 15 October 1918), also known as Shirdi Sai Baba, was an Indian spiritual master who is regarded by his devotees to be a manifestation of Sri Dattaguru and identified as a saint and a fakir.[2] He was likely born around 1838[3] and was revered by both his Hindu and Muslim devotees during, as well as after, his lifetime.
